title: World Clock Deluxe 4.18.1 – World time clock and meeting planner

title: BlueHarvest 8.0.12 – Disable DS_Store creation and more
content: BlueHarvest is an exterminator for your Mac’s unnecessary Desktop Service Store (DS_Store) and resource fork (_AppleDouble) files. title: Dependency Walker 1.4.1 – Scans any 32-bit or 64-bit Mach-O executables
content: Dependency Walker is a utility that scans any 32-bit or 64-bit Mach-O executables (executable, so, dylib or kext) of any architectures (i386, x86_64, ppc, ppc64, arm and arm64) and builds a hierarchical tree diagram of all dependent modules. For each module found, it lists all the functions that are exported by that module, and which […]
